akn:section.akn:heading: Service credit as deck officer or junior engineer for promotion purposes

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3032. Service credit as deck officer or junior engineer for promotion purposes For purposes of promotion, there shall be counted in addition to active commissioned service, service as deck officer or junior engineer. (Pub. L. 107–372, title II, § 232, Dec. 19, 2002, 116 Stat. 3088.)
Editorial Notes Codification Provisions similar to this section are contained in section 854a of this title.
